name: Bug Invasion (itch)
description:
Shoot the bugs and fix the glitches to repair the computer.  Upgrade your weapon to clear waves of bugs.

Made by me with some ideas from my dear friend Jonatan. I would love to see your feedback and comments about the game.

The game is made for the Game Jam Game Off 2021. This is my first game jam and it has been really fun creating the game and learning new stuff.

Github Repository: https://github.com/xfac11/Bug-Game
